required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety Profile Following Inactivated COVID-19 Vaccine in Healthy Adults Aged >18 Years in Indonesia
clinical_study.official_title: Safety Profile Following Inactivated COVID-19 Vaccine in Healthy Adults Aged >18 Years in Indonesia

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is evaluating safety profile of COVID-19 Vaccine in healthy adults aged >18 years in Indonesia.

detailed_description.textblock:
To assess any serious systemic reaction within 30 minutes after COVID-19 vaccine immunization.
To assess systemic reaction after COVID-19 Vaccine immunization. To assess local reaction after COVID-19 Vaccine immunization. To assess any serious adverse event after COVID-19 Vaccine immunization.

primary_outcome.measure: Any serious adverse event occurring from inclusion until 30 minutes after the injection
primary_outcome.description: Number and percentage of subjects with serious systemic reactions 30 minutes after immunization.

secondary_outcome.measure: Local reaction and systemic events occurring within 30 minutes after each immunization.
secondary_outcome.description: Number and percentage of subjects with at least one of these adverse events, solicited or not, within 30 minutes after vaccination.

secondary_outcome.measure: Local reaction and systemic events occurring within 28 days after immunization
secondary_outcome.description: Number and percentage of subjects with at least one of these adverse events, solicited or not, within 28 days after vaccination.

secondary_outcome.measure: Any serious adverse event during observation period.
secondary_outcome.description: Number and percentage of subjects with serious adverse event from inclusion until 28 day after vaccination.

study_pop.textblock: The study is involving healthy adults aged > 18 years.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Clinically healthy adults aged > 18 years.
- Subjects have been informed properly regarding the study and signed the informed consent form.
- Subjects will commit to comply with the instructions of the investigator and the schedule of the trial.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects concomitantly enrolled or scheduled to be enrolled in another trial.
- Evolving mild, moderate or severe illness, especially infectious disease or fever (body temperature ≥37.5℃, measured with thermometer).
- Women who are lactating, pregnant or planning to become pregnant during the study period.
- History of uncontrolled coagulopathy or blood disorders contraindicating intramuscular injection.
- Subjects who have any history of confirmed or suspected immunosuppressive or immunodeficient state, or received in the previous 4 weeks a treatment likely to alter the immune response (intravenous immunoglobulins, blood-derived products or long-term corticosteroid therapy (> 2 weeks)).
- Subjects receive any vaccination within 1 month before and after IP immunization.
- Subjects plan to move from the study area before the end of study period.
